1.title: The Return of Aks
1.plot: Aditi stumbles upon a dark secret: she learns that her recently deceased father, Ajay Bisht, was the notorious 'Aks' of Mussoorie (a dreaded serial killer who operated in Mussorie five years ago). She believes she can keep this information a secret: however when the killings start up again - we realize that a copycat killer is on the loose.

2.title: Sins of the Father
2.plot: We learn more about the secrets festering in this seemingly bucolic local community - as we get to know more about our suspects. Aditi is struggling with the dilemma of whether to tell Rishi her secret or not - even as the body of Jatin Sharma is discovered near Big Fred's. It seems - like the 'Aks' has struck again.

3.title: Friend or Foe
3.plot: We learn more about the secrets festering in this seemingly bucolic local community - as we get to know more about our suspects. Aditi is struggling with the dilemma of whether to tell Rishi her secret or not - even as the body of Jatin Sharma is discovered near Big Fred's. It seems - like the 'Aks' has struck again.

4.title: Hell Station
4.plot: The investigations continue - even as Freddy Fernandes turns up dead in his shack. Aditi's investigation - leads her to discover Freddy's hidden fetish, his habit of planting a camera in the loo. Indirectly sends all the proofs to Rishi. They find Copycat killer's footage in the washroom but killer's face is covered with the cap and they couldn't make out the person who he is.. Aditi gets to know the reason behind Freddy's murder that killer must have got to know about the footage and had killed him.

5.title: Dead Ends
5.plot: Mahesh climbs right to the very top of Aditi's suspect list, even as she tries to get in touch with him repeatedly. However, she can't seem to reach him, as her fruitless search for Mahesh continues. Mahesh surprises her by calling her up and asks her to meet him at a secret location (as he was being hunted), so that he could tell her who the killer was.

6.title: Tick Tock
6.plot: Aditi reaches the place where Mahesh had called her but it's too late. The copycat killer has burnt Mahesh to a crisp, in his car, to protect his identity. Ishaan tells Rishi that Aditi is hiding something from him. Rishi starts doubting Aditi and she wants to confess everything with Rishi but killer gives her a threat that he will kill Rishi.

7.title: Trust Issues
7.plot: Aditi feels like she's hit a dead end but a further communique with the copycat killer leads her to suspect Varun. When Tanmay's body is discovered,Varun's bisexuality and connections to both Tanmay and Alisha are uncovered. Varun is released by the police, but is seen doing something suspicious: could he be the copycat killer?

8.title: Past Tense
8.plot: Aditi learns that her father was a "Conscientious Killer" - he only killed those people who deserved it, who needed to be brought to justice as they had evaded the law. This is when we really dive into her 'Dar Tendencies' even as the killer tries to tempt her to the dark side by using Ishaan against her.

9.title: Live and Let Die
9.plot: This episode will see Aditi grappling with her dark side, even as we reveal the ugly truth behind her association with Ishaan (how he attempted to molest her). However, Aditi will eventually refuse to succumb to the allure of her dark side and try to warn Ishaan. The copycat killer doesn't play by any rules.

10.title: Collateral Damage
10.plot: Even as all the other suspects are currently at play, Aditi tries to hone in on the identity of the mysterious copycat killer who's been plaguing the city. The copycat killer takes Ishaan with him. The episode reaches its climax with Ishaan getting killed and Nisha slipping into a coma which seems to be a result of her witnessing the copycat killer committing a crime.

11.title: Unmasked
11.plot: As the central cast is reeling under the impact of Nisha's state, Aditi ends up discovering new evidence at the crime scene that leads her straight to Mahesh. This episode reveals that Mahesh was still alive and well, and was, in fact, the Copy Cat Killer.

12.title: On the hunt

13.title: The Bitter End

imdb.plot outline: Based on the backdrop of a beautiful and serene city Mussoorie, the series revolves around a mysterious story of a merciless serial killer 'AKS'. The entire city is in a miff to know about the man behind the endless murders. A fearless journalist Aditi Bisht, daughter of a celebrated senior cop of the city - Ajay Bisht and a wife of reputed cop Rishi Pant is on a mission to solve the case and find the serial killer. But a twist follows when Aditi is shocked to know about the mystery man and plans to close the case without revealing the details to anybody. But well, another surprise awaits, as Aditi gets trapped by a copycat killer claiming himself to be 'AKS'. Will Aditi be able to track down the copycat killer before he reaches the endgame of his deranged puzzle? How long will she be able to hide the truth from her husband or the people of Mussoorie? And will there be collateral damage along the way?
imdb.title: 13 Mussoorie
plot: Based on the backdrop of a beautiful and serene city Mussoorie, the series revolves around a mysterious story of a merciless serial killer 'AKS'. The entire city is in a miff to know about the man behind the endless murders. A fearless journalist Aditi Bisht, daughter of a celebrated senior cop of the city - Ajay Bisht and a wife of reputed cop Rishi Pant is on a mission to solve the case and find the serial killer. But a twist follows when Aditi is shocked to know about the mystery man and plans to close the case without revealing the details to anybody. But well, another surprise awaits, as Aditi gets trapped by a copycat killer claiming himself to be 'AKS'. Will Aditi be able to track down the copycat killer before he reaches the endgame of his deranged puzzle? How long will she be able to hide the truth from her husband or the people of Mussoorie? And will there be collateral damage along the way?

Aditi, a journalist and daughter of a police officer cum serial killer under the name of Aks tries to find out who is impersonating her dad aka Aks after her father dies. Based in Mussoorie, the suspense thriller cum serial killer story takes us through the trails n tribulations the daughter (female lead) endures. To add, her husband is also a police officer who is assigned this case but later withdrawn from the same as he is unable to catch Aks. Storyline: good Acting: average, unimpressive by both the leads. Better actors could have held audience' the interest. Direction: not at par. Loosely built characters, misses minutes details. Pro: good storyline and cinematography. Don't watch with high hopes and expectations.
